body_html:
So I just want to know if tensor flow support real separation on different GPU for different process.
For example, one process is assigned to use GPU:0, so when the session start to run, tensor flow only create one device gpu:0 for use and all the rest GPUs are in the idle status. This is make sense, in every aspect.

body:
So I just want to know if tensor flow support real separation on different GPU for different process.
For example, one process is assigned to use GPU:0, so when the session start to run, tensor flow only create one device gpu:0 for use and all the rest GPUs are in the idle status. This is make sense, in every aspect.
